title: I have a random ip boost
body: Did I miss something? I got a random 4 win ip boost, I know my account has been kinda compromised sadly and i gotta fix it, but there is no rp spent on my account. Someone please. If I dind't do anything good i dont want the ip boost i never bought :/ i feel like it's kinda undesereved unless i was given it by riot or something :/

replies.body: Did you just recently validate your email?  Because you get a 4 win boost when you validate for the first time.
No, i did that when i first started playing.

I'm looking at your account.  It looks like you sent the validation request back then, but never actually finished the validation.

So I'm pretty sure the boost came from that.  If you're concerned though, feel free to write in a ticket and we can take a look into your account.
Well, ok. I will trust you on this. Thanks lots for being quick to respond.
